src:
板栗燜雞 好吃下飯家常菜（視頻）

06 Nov 2019, 03:00

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月06日訊】板栗燜雞
配料：雞半只，板栗300克，香菇8朵，姜幾片，生抽20克，蠔油10克，鹽3克，白糖5克，料酒15克
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/06/a102701047.html
text:
Chestnut 焖 chicken, delicious meal, home cooking (video)

06 Nov 2019, 03:00

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 06, 2019] Chestnut pheasant
Ingredients: half chicken, 300 grams of chestnut, 8 mushrooms, a few slices of ginger, 20 grams of soy sauce, 10 grams of oyster sauce, 3 grams of salt, 5 grams of sugar, 15 grams of cooking wine
The following YouTube video demo:
